realTimeUpdates.title: Real-Time Updates

compete.title: Compete & Win Glory
compete.description: Climb the leaderboards, compete with other players, and earn bragging rights. No money, just pure competition.

safeSec.title: Safe & Secure
safeSec.description: Your data is protected with industry-standard security. No payment information required. Play with complete peace of mind.

entertainment.title: Pure Entertainment
entertainment.description: Enjoy fantasy cricket for what it is—pure fun and entertainment. No stress about losing money, just enjoy the game.
